description: This file defines a React functional component 'ProjectCard' which displays information about a Jira project, including its icon, name, description, lead, access level, category, and related metadata.

methods.name: getProjectTypeIcon
methods.description: Returns an emoji icon based on the project type key.

methods.name: getProjectUrl
methods.description: Constructs a URL to the Jira project page based on domain and project key.
